context: Hello! What kind of movie are you thinking about seeing today?
I'm doing great, how about you?
Fine thanks. I'd love to see something similar to There's Something About Mary (1998) That movie always cracks me up!
That is a very funny movie. How about Hall Pass ? It's funny in a sexy way, too. Oh, and Along Came Polly . I haven't seen it in awhile, but I remember it was hilarious
Oh wow. I haven't even heard of it. Looking it up right now... Oh I saw that one! Excellent suggestion!
resp: Another I'd suggest is The 40-Year-Old Virgin (2005) . That movie is one of my all-time favorites.
